column4: Hey guys, wtf's up with 10.04? I installed it using ext3, now i'm getting that stupid initramfs message and well GRUB2 doesn't even load just moves straight to ubuntu load which then dies.... 64 bit system, Dual booted with Windows 7 64 bit, 6gb ram, 2.66GHz Intel Core 2 Duo I'm sure that's the main stuff you need to know right?
to open the grub menu, you either hold shift during boot or press escape when the screen goes black after post
What do I do from there then?
How would I get rid of this initramfs err? lol. (Using EXT3 btw)
